last_episode_to_air.name: Shitstorm
last_episode_to_air.overview: In hopes of clearing the air, Howard organizes a late-night meeting with Scott and Zak. But the trio's bitter history stands in the way.

name: Shot in the Dark
overview: Three rival freelance stringers scour the streets at night to film crime scenes, fires, accidents -- and anything else they can sell to news outlets.

episodes.name: The Hustle
episodes.overview: Howard, Zak and Scott vie for the night's big story, not knowing if it will be a bus fire, a drowning or a high-speed chase through LA.

episodes.name: Crash and Burn
episodes.overview: While Austin copes with the aftermath of a nerve-wracking car wreck, Scott bristles at the competition and Zak strikes a deal.

episodes.name: Near Hits
episodes.overview: Tensions brew as the rivalry between Scott and Zak slides into focus. Howard wonders if he and his brothers have what it takes to compete.

episodes.name: Nice Package
episodes.overview: As rain leads to drama on the freeways, Austin considers a big change and Scott gets the rare opportunity to do a story with a happy ending.

episodes.name: String or Die
episodes.overview: Zak's decision rubs Scott the wrong way. Howard tries to break a bad streak by hustling for a story. Scott drops a bombshell on Todd.

episodes.name: Dead of Night
episodes.overview: Victor breaks a cardinal rule. Scott gets into it with some cops at a crime scene. Zak makes Howard a life-changing offer.

episodes.name: Chasing Hell
episodes.overview: After defusing a tense situation, Howard comes across a bear of a story. Zak mourns the loss of a fellow stringer. Austin makes a decision.

episodes.name: Shitstorm
episodes.overview: In hopes of clearing the air, Howard organizes a late-night meeting with Scott and Zak. But the trio's bitter history stands in the way.
